case.name: Mika helps?
case.description: When playing with Rainbow Mika, she'll surprise Juri by lifting her when she's removing her tights.

case.name: Juri conflicted
case.description: Juri considers killing Mika after she picked her up.

case.name: Juri's butt
case.description: After Juri gets naked, she shows her butt to the player.

case.name: Juri embarrassed
case.description: After Juri's failed attack on Chun-Li, she shows a softer side of her.
